author: Anthony L. Fisher
title: Trump's right about one thing, the World Health Organization deserves some blame for the coronavirus pandemic
description: Books will one day be books written about President Donald Trump and his administration's litany of coronavirus denialism and incompetence. But they should spare a few chapters for the World Health Organization (WHO) for credulously parroting bogus informatio…
content:
Business Insider
There will one day be books written about President Donald Trump and his administration's litany of coronavirus denialism and incompetence that helped lead the nation into the ongoing historic disaster.
